snippet.title: Battle Gem Ponies Combat Demo Tour
snippet.description:
Play the Demo:  https://yotesgames.itch.io/battle-gem-ponies
Check out our Kickstarter: https://bit.ly/36cvUC8



Find us on Social Media: https://linktr.ee/YotesMark
Follow BGP's Development: http://www.yotesgames.com

The BGP Combat Demo is a pre-alpha sandbox build of the game's combat system. Customize a team of ponies and duke it out in turn-based battles!



00:00 Intro
00:26 Brief History
01:11 Match Setup
01:46 Team Select 
02:22 Items & Equips
02:53 Nicknames
03:46 Move Customization 
05:14 Team Presets
05:55 BV's & Stats 
06:41 Party Select
07:13 Battle Mechanics
08:54 Battle - Strategizing
10:00 Battle - Things Don't Always Go According to Plan... 
10:36 Battle - Ability Activation & A Balanced Roster
11:42 Battle - Counters
12:02 Battle - Using Healing Items
12:20 Battle - Evasion Tactics

13:10 Battle - Elemental Classes
14:18 Battle - Stat Buff Display
14:26 Battle - Risky Moves & Dizzy State
14:38 Battle - Placeholder Art
15:12 Battle - Out of GP? Use Tackle!
15:40 End of Match

16:00 Dev Credits
17:00 Kickstarter
17:13 Release Date
17:42 Wrap Up
18:46 Play It Now!


Music by:

Euleom -  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGDGqqpvqjfSXnE4pSfFSyQ

Bluco - https://soundcloud.com/blucario
